00036 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00037 #import <UIKit/UIKit.h>
00038 
00039 @protocol JRConnectionManagerDelegate <NSObject>
00040 @optional
00041 - (void)connectionDidFinishLoadingWithPayload:(NSString*)payload request:(NSURLRequest*)request andTag:(void*)userdata;
00042 - (void)connectionDidFinishLoadingWithFullResponse:(NSURLResponse*)fullResponse 
00043                                   unencodedPayload:(NSData*)payload 
00044                                            request:(NSURLRequest*)request 
00045                                             andTag:(void*)userdata;
00046 - (void)connectionDidFailWithError:(NSError*)error request:(NSURLRequest*)request andTag:(void*)userdata;
00047 - (void)connectionWasStoppedWithTag:(void*)userdata;
00048 @end
00049 
00050 @interface JRConnectionManager : NSObject 
00051 {
00052     CFMutableDictionaryRef connectionBuffers;
00053 }
00054 
00055 @property CFMutableDictionaryRef connectionBuffers;
00056 
00057 + (bool)createConnectionFromRequest:(NSURLRequest*)request 
00058                         forDelegate:(id<JRConnectionManagerDelegate>)delegate 
00059                             withTag:(void*)userdata;
00060 
00061 + (bool)createConnectionFromRequest:(NSURLRequest*)request 
00062                         forDelegate:(id<JRConnectionManagerDelegate>)delegate 
00063                  returnFullResponse:(BOOL)returnFullResponse
00064                             withTag:(void*)userdata;
00065 
00066 + (void)stopConnectionsForDelegate:(id<JRConnectionManagerDelegate>)delegate;
00067 
00068 + (NSUInteger)openConnections;
00069 @end
